__e: Why are you wasting time talking to a grumpy old rat?
Yeah, well, I'd try that, but I'm not a crotchety old bastard.
You know? My father was right. He said you were a disagreeable old bastard.
It is just disturbing enough so that leaving the house, I'm cranky and less able to suffer fools, which brings me back to you:
You know how, when you're sick, you're allowed to be cranky and say whatever you want and other people's feelings don't matter?
I was just hungry and cranky, and I've never been called "ma'am" before.
